oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Larry Gatlin Interview by Bob Battle 8-1-1978
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is an interview of Larry Gatlin by Bob Battle. The interview takes place on 8-1-78.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Larry Gatlin;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Side One - (0:02) -- Bob Battle introduction of himself and mentions that he's writing for Country Style Magazine. Bob Battle also wrote for The Nashville Banner. (0:39) -- Bob Battle asks Larry Gatlin about his possible upcoming roles in movies and television shows. (1:13) -- Larry Gatlin mentions that he's written a soundtrack for his upcoming movie, "Penny Annie." (1:44) -- Larry Gatlin mentions that he's filming the movie with Silo Productions. (2:15) -- Larry Gatlin speaks about the meaning of "Penny Annie." (3:04) -- Bob Battle asks about how Larry Gatlin's career is going so far. (4:38) -- Bob Battle asks Larry Gatlin about his recent material with The Gatlin Brothers. Larry Gatlin mentions the record "Do It Again Tonight" and The Gatlin Brothers' current album "Love Is Just A Game." (4:58) -- Bob Battle asks Larry Gatlin about his plans for a new album. (5:34) -- Bob Battle asks Larry Gatlin about his recent success. (7:02) -- Bob Battle asks whether the stories in Larry Gatlin's music have helped sell his music. (7:49) -- Bob Battle asks Larry Gatlin's about his involvement with The Grand Ole Opry. (8:13) -- Bob Battle mentions his column "Country Cookin'" for Country Style Magazine. (8:41) -- Bob Battle asks Larry Gatlin whether he wishes to add anything else to his article in Country Style Magazine. Larry Gatlin speaks about his relationship with his fans.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gatlin, Larry;
